    • Class matchle.Filter

      class Filter extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • pattern
          String pattern
          A human-readable string representation of the filter pattern. This describes the filter constraints in a textual format.

    • Class matchle.GameState

      class GameState extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • accumulatedFilter
          Filter accumulatedFilter
          The accumulated filter representing all constraints from previous guesses
        • candidateCorpus
          Corpus candidateCorpus
          The current corpus of candidate words that match all constraints
        • secretKey
          NGram secretKey
          The secret key (target word) that the player is trying to guess

    • Class matchle.MatchleGUI

      class MatchleGUI extends JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • bestGuessLabel
          JLabel bestGuessLabel
          Label showing the best guess suggestion
        • bottomPanel
          JPanel bottomPanel
          Bottom panel containing status information
        • candidateLabel
          JLabel candidateLabel
          Label showing number of remaining candidate words
        • centerPanel
          JScrollPane centerPanel
          Scrollable panel in the center of the layout
        • corpus
          Corpus corpus
          Original corpus of words loaded at game start
        • darkModeEnabled
          boolean darkModeEnabled
          Current theme state (dark mode enabled/disabled)
        • darkModeToggle
          JToggleButton darkModeToggle
          Toggle button for dark/light mode
        • difficultySelector
          JComboBox<String> difficultySelector
          Dropdown for selecting difficulty level
        • feedbackArea
          JTextArea feedbackArea
          Text area displaying game feedback and history
        • feedbackPanel
          JPanel feedbackPanel
          Panel containing feedback text area
        • gameLogic
          GameLogic gameLogic
          Game logic engine that handles core mechanics
        • guessField
          JTextField guessField
          Text field for entering guesses
        • loadGameButton
          JButton loadGameButton
          Button to load a saved game
        • newGameButton
          JButton newGameButton
          Button to start a new game
        • saveGameButton
          JButton saveGameButton
          Button to save the current game
        • submitButton
          JButton submitButton
          Button to submit a guess
        • topPanel
          JPanel topPanel
          Top panel containing controls

    • Class matchle.NGram

      class NGram extends Object implements Serializable
      serialVersionUID:
      1L

      • Serialized Fields

        • charset
          Set<Character> charset
          Set of unique characters in this NGram for efficient containment checks

          The internal list of characters in this NGram
